string-array.item: Android is a stack of software for mobile devices which has Operating System, middleware and some key applications.
Android programs are compiled into .dex (Dalvik Executable) files, which are in turn zipped into a single .apk file on the device.
The APK file is compressed the AndroidManifest.xml file, application code (.dex files), resource files, and other files. A project is compiled into a single .apk file.
